label: A4BCD6_hP12_191_h_a_b_i-001
title: Lucabindiite (KAs$_{4}$O$_{6}$Cl) Structure
comments: (Pertlik, 1988) puts this in the non-centrosymmetric space group $P622$ \#177.  The only Wyckoff position in this space group which is not centrosymmetric is the general point, (12n).  All the other Wyckoff positions have counterparts in the centrosymmetric space group $P6/mmm$ \#191, as shown here.
